component.name: LandIce
component.definition: Definition of component type LandIce required

component.name: LandIceKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type LandIceKeyProperties required

parameter.name: CouplingIceSheet-IceShelves
parameter.definition: Method by which ice sheets are coupled to ice shelves

parameter.name: GroundingLineMethod
parameter.definition: Specify the technique used for modelling the grounding line

parameter.name: LandIceAlbedo
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LandIceAlbedo required

parameter.name: AlbedoFunctionOf
parameter.definition: List those values that land ice albedo is a function of

component.name: LandIceGlaciers
component.definition: Definition of component type LandIceGlaciers required

parameter.name: DynamicArealExtent
parameter.definition: Does the model include a dynamic glacier extent?

parameter.name: AblationCalculation
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used to model glacier ablation

parameter.name: DowscalingTechnique
parameter.definition: How the atmospheric variables are used in the mass balance calculations.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Is glacier snow treated in the same way as that in the land surface scheme?

constraint.name: if Method is "different from Snow in LandSurface"

parameter.name: NumberOfSnowLayers
parameter.definition: How many glacier snow layers does the model treat?

parameter.name: Properties
parameter.definition: Description of processes affecting snow on glaciers

component.name: LandIceSheet
component.definition: Definition of component type LandIceSheet required

parameter.name: AblationCalculation
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used to calculate ablation in the ice sheet mass balance

parameter.name: DowscalingTechnique
parameter.definition: How the atmospheric variables are used in the mass balance calculations.

parameter.name: CouplingWithAtmosphere
parameter.definition: Coupling method between land ice sheet and atmosphere.

parameter.name: GridConfig
parameter.definition: How does the grid configuration for the land ice sheet compare to that used in the land surface scheme?

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the land ice sheet model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the horizontal grid used for land ice sheet.

parameter.name: Approximation
parameter.definition: Approximation type used in modelling ice sheet dynamics

parameter.name: IceStreams
parameter.definition: Are ice streams modelled within the land ice model?

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: How does the treatment of land-ice snow compare with treatment in the land-surface model?

constraint.name: if Method is "different from Snow in LandSurface"

parameter.name: NumberOfSnowLayers
parameter.definition: How many snow layers are included in modelling land ice sheets?

parameter.name: Properties
parameter.definition: Description of processes affecting snow on ice sheets

component.name: LandIceShelves
component.definition: Definition of component type LandIceShelves required

parameter.name: Bottom
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Bottom required

parameter.name: AblationCalculation
parameter.definition: type of scheme used to model ablation in ice shelves

parameter.name: DowscalingTechnique
parameter.definition: How the atmospheric variables are used in the mass balance calculations.

component.name: LandIceShelvesDynamics
component.definition: Definition of component type LandIceShelvesDynamics required

parameter.name: CouplingWithOcean
parameter.definition: Coupling method between LandIceShelves and Ocean.

parameter.name: GridConfig
parameter.definition: Description of the grid on which ice shelves are modelled

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the land ice shelves model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the horizontal grid used for land ice shelves.

parameter.name: Approximation
parameter.definition: Numerical approximation used in modelling ice shelf dynamics

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: How does the treatment of snow on ice shelves compare to treatment of snow in the land surface model?

constraint.name: if Method is "different from Snow in LandSurface"

parameter.name: NumberOfSnowLayers
parameter.definition: How many snow layers are modelled in the ice shelf scheme

parameter.name: Properties
parameter.definition: Describe the properties of the model's ice shelf scheme
